mapper.update:
update SF_GRADE_CHANGE
CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_OLD_MONITOR_GRADE_KEY = #{dicOldMonitorGradeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_MONITOR_GRADE_KEY = #{dicMonitorGradeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_CHANGE_REASON_KEY = #{dicChangeReasonKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JC_SITUATION = #{jcSituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KF_SITUATION = #{kfSituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_CHECK_TYPE_KEY = #{dicCheckTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE_PATH = #{notePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE_PATH_NAME = #{notePathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_TIME = #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BLANK_FLAG = #{blankFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_ACCOUNT_NAME = #{flagAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_ACCOUNT_ID = #{flagAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_TIME = #{flagTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FLAG_REASON_ID = #{flagReasonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_DETAIL_REASON = #{flagDetailReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_PATH = #{flagPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_PATH_NAME = #{flagPathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNT_OPINION = #{accountOpinion,jdbcType=CLOB},
SFS_OPINION = #{SFSOpinion,jdbcType=CLOB},
PRINT_STATUS = #{printStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SF_GRADE_CHANGE set CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_OLD_MONITOR_GRADE_KEY = #{dicOldMonitorGradeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_MONITOR_GRADE_KEY = #{dicMonitorGradeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_CHANGE_REASON_KEY = #{dicChangeReasonKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JC_SITUATION = #{jcSituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KF_SITUATION = #{kfSituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_CHECK_TYPE_KEY = #{dicCheckTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE_PATH = #{notePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE_PATH_NAME = #{notePathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORT_TIME = #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BLANK_FLAG = #{blankFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG_ACCOUNT_NAME = #{flagAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG_ACCOUNT_ID = #{flagAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG_TIME = #{flagTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLAG_REASON_ID = #{flagReasonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG_DETAIL_REASON = #{flagDetailReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG_PATH = #{flagPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG_PATH_NAME = #{flagPathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT_OPINION = #{accountOpinion,jdbcType=CLOB}, SFS_OPINION = #{SFSOpinion,jdbcType=CLOB}, PRINT_STATUS = #{printStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: AND exists ( select tsg.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) tsg where t3.ID=tsg.id)
AND exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t2.group_id=g.id)
